long_description: Travel light, fast and hydrated and still have room for the essentials with the Mountainsmith Buzz TLS lumbar pack. Dual bottle hydration makes it an ideal choice for long runs and short hikes. Features 2 insulated water bottle pockets and 2 BPA-free 22 fl. oz. water bottles. Waistbelt and back are lined with moisture-wicking mesh and plush foam to keep you comfortable during exertion; adjustable waistbelt personalizes fit. Zippered back pocket and 2 mesh energy gel pockets provide plenty of storage options for energy food, ID and other essentials;. Exterior cord with toggle adjustment for lashing on a light jacket or gloves. Reflective piping increases visibility in low light. Durable recycled PET fabric and nylon lining stand up to wear and tear. Closeout.
short_description: Travel light, fast and hydrated and still have room for the essentials with the Mountainsmith Buzz TLS lumbar pack. Dual bottle hydration makes it an ideal choice for long runs and short hikes.
